GettingStarted1: This app is locked via phone biometric scans in order to develop a new secured application that works hand-in-hand with phone's "Remember me" function.
GettingStarted3: Make sure your phone is PIN/Biometric protected.
GettingStarted4: Click Enter to access the DEMO application.
AboutThisApp1: This application is used to showcase the capabilities of Javascript + Native Mobile development. It is a work of both Han and Lee wan used for research and experimental purposes. Currently it's designed to work on both iOS and Android. But due to $ issues, this app is only published in Android platform. This application and web related site does not store any information of your personal details.
Login_Bio_SubTitle: Log in using your biometric credential
